structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 238, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 8, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4356t-17-2e.
